title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SageMaker & MLflow: Innovate faster with no infrastructure management (AIM3340)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - SageMaker 与 MLflow：无需基础设施管理，加速创新 (AIM3340)
abstract: As organizations build and customize multiple AI models and agents, managing experiments, versions, and evaluations becomes increasingly complex. In this session, see how Intuit, a leader in financial technology, is using Amazon SageMaker with MLflow to accelerate their AI initiatives and empower their teams to build and deploy AI solutions with confidence. Discover how this new capability eliminates infrastructure management while providing comprehensive experiment tracking, model evaluation, and observability. Learn to efficiently manage your growing AI portfolio across traditional ML, custom models, generative AI applications, and fine-tuned agents—all from a single, streamlined environment.
abstract_cn: 随着组织构建和定制多个AI模型和代理，管理实验、版本和评估变得越来越复杂。在本次会议中，了解金融科技领域的领导者Intuit如何使用Amazon SageMaker与MLflow来加速其AI计划，并赋能团队自信地构建和部署AI解决方案。探索这一新功能如何消除基础设施管理，同时提供全面的实验跟踪、模型评估和可观测性。学习如何从单一的精简环境中高效管理不断增长的AI产品组合，涵盖传统机器学习、自定义模型、生成式AI应用程序和微调代理。
